title: At Sivershchyna and Slobozhanschyna directions Russian army shelled Seredyna Buda, Popivka, Kindrativka, Oleksandrivka, Velyk...
content: At Sivershchyna and Slobozhanschyna directions Russian army shelled Seredyna Buda, Popivka, Kindrativka, Oleksandrivka, Velyka Pysarivka of Sumy region. Russian aviation conducted airstrikes at Kozacha Lopan, Vovchansk, Okhrymivka of Kharkiv region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
author: Live UA Map
